devdoc.details: Implements AggregatorV3Interface to mimic being a Chainlink price feed

params._sourceFeed: Address of the source Chainlink price feed
params._targetDecimals: Target decimal precision (must be less than or equal to source decimals)

params._roundId: The round ID to retrieve data for

returns.answeredInRound: The round in which the answer was computed
returns.startedAt: The timestamp when the round started
returns.updatedAt: The timestamp when the round was updated

returns.answeredInRound: The round in which the answer was computed
returns.startedAt: The timestamp when the round started
returns.updatedAt: The timestamp when the round was updated

devdoc.title: ChainlinkDecimalConverter

InvalidDecimalsUpscaleNotSupported().notice: Error thrown when target decimals exceed source decimals

constructor.notice: Constructor to initialize the decimal converter

description().notice: Returns the description of the original feed

getRoundData(uint80).notice: Gets data for a specific round

latestRoundData().notice: Gets data for the latest round

sourceDecimals().notice: Original decimals from the source feed

version().notice: Returns the version of the original feed

userdoc.notice: Converts between Chainlink price feeds with different decimal precisions
